title: The Nightmare before Christmas
creator_credit: Henry Selick, Tim Burton, Denise Di Novi and Touchstone Pictures
brief_description: This delightfully different animated fantasy opens the door to an intriguing new world - where extraordinary surprises and captivating music await. Journey on an incredible adventure of fantastic sights and sounds with the whimsical characters, Pumpkin Jack, Jack Skellington, and the rag doll, Sally. One day Jack discovers Christmastown - a glittering glory of bright lights and shiny packages. Charmed by its magic, Jack brings back this newfound holiday to his ghoulish friends, triggering an hilarious turn of events. Told through the innovative technique of stop-motion animation is an unparalleled adventure that dazzles the eye and charms the mind. Cast includes Danny Elfman, Chris Sarandon, Catherine O’Hara, William Hickey, Glenn Shadix.
